    • getEventsByData

      @GetMapping("/events/data={data}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,​Object>> getEventsByData​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="20") int size, @PathVariable("data") String data) throws ParseException
      Gets the events by data or interval of data.
      Parameters:
      page - the page
      size - the size
      data - the data/interval of data (ex. '2021-11-05' or '2021-11-05,2022-01-18')
      Returns:
      the events by data
      Throws:
      ParseException - the parse exception of data inserted

      size - the size
      idPref - the id of user
